column2: "Mmm, yeah, you've become quite accustomed to your role as a Force. You're looking more like a veteran."
"But in fact, you can only use the rod satisfactorily. ...oh, that could never be the case, right?!"
"So that's why you should test your strength! Complete the quest I give you with the Talis!"
"As always, I'll be here watching you on the monitor. Fire yourself up and get going!"
